body: Alun MacDonald tweeting from Southern Sudan: "In North Sudan seems the big issue is Recession not Referendum. Irate emails from friends about the new austerity cuts & price rises"
original_body: Alun MacDonald tweeting from Southern Sudan: "In North Sudan seems the big issue is Recession not Referendum. Irate emails from friends about the new austerity cuts & price rises"
title: Sudan: Recession big issue in North Sudan than referendum
